name: Grow MagicMaster
description:
PixelStar Games' idle fantasy RPG game 'Grow Magic Master' has been released.

Conquer dungeons and collect various legendary magic to become the best mage.

[Game Features]
- Exciting action
- Various weapons and equipment
- Various skills and special abilities
- Crafting magic, wands, and equipment using the crafting system
- Hero system (various stats)
- Pet system
